title: Cobra bites woman in Gorakhpur, watch‑VIDEO: Family searched for snake for 1 hour, kept making video, life lost due to lack of treatment
summary: A tragic incident in Gorakhpur where a woman bitten by a cobra succumbed after her family spent an hour searching for the snake and filming instead of taking her for treatment.

title: 500‑year‑old Kashi Ramleela faces crisis: Road closed due to flyover construction, organisers protest with artists; committee warns of disruption to 'Nakkatayya Julus'
summary: Organisers of the 500‑year‑old Kashi Ramleela in Varanasi say a flyover construction has closed the procession route and threatens to disrupt the traditional 'Nakkatayya Julus'. Artists and committees are protesting for cultural preservation.

title: President Murmu reaches Mathura by world’s most deluxe train: Offers prayers at Banke Bihari Temple, completes 500‑metre parikrama in Nidhivan, inaugurates bhajan kuti
summary: President Droupadi Murmu visited Mathura aboard a luxury train, offered prayers at the Banke Bihari temple, completed a 500‑metre parikrama in Nidhivan and inaugurated a bhajan kuti as part of her Uttar Pradesh tour.

title: Ex‑MLA Irfan Solanki to be released after 24 months: High Court grants bail in Gangster Act case; family rejoices, mother gets emotional
summary: Former MLA Irfan Solanki, jailed under the Gangster Act, is set to be released after 24 months following bail granted by the High Court.  His family celebrated the decision as his mother became emotional.

title: Akhilesh Yadav alleges police‑kidnapping nexus in UP: SP leader claims Kanpur incident could expose IAS, IPS and BJP collusion; ex‑BJP MLA joins Samajwadi Party
summary: Samajwadi Party chief Akhilesh Yadav alleged collusion between police and kidnappers in Uttar Pradesh, suggesting a Kanpur case could implicate IAS, IPS officers and the BJP.  Meanwhile, a former BJP MLA joined the Samajwadi Party.
